message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value, I am extending an initial offer of $950,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm on a tight budget. I could consider a price closer to $750,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your budget constraints, I am willing to adjust my offer to $800,000 for the product.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  To be frank, $775,000 is the highest I can go.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. In light of our ongoing discussion, I am willing to consider $785,000 as the final price for the product.
